title: Charming Historic Apartment in the Heart of Sopot Centrum
description: Step into this exquisite 3-bedroom apartment that marries historic beauty with modern sustainability. Located in an elegantly restored, energy-efficient building, this spacious 108 sqm home balances original Art Nouveau flourishes with 21st-century touches like solar panels and stylish interiors. Entertain with sweeping city views from the communal rooftop deck or unwind in the two renovated bathrooms finished with subtle historic accents.
neighborhood_description: Set in Sopot's Centrum area, this home is part of a vibrant, bike-friendly neighborhood renowned for its coastal charm. The surrounding blocks brim with artistic boutiques, cafes, and theaters, attracting creatives and admirers of unique urban life. With rapid public transport, well-maintained bike lines, and easy highway access, Centrum is designed for integrated, active living.
lifestyle_benefits: walkable to art galleries and cafes
excellent transit for tenants or guests
target_buyer: Ideal for discerning property investors who value both immediate rental potential and long-term asset appreciation in one of Sopot’s permanent-demand neighborhoods.
market_positioning: Stands apart as a rare blend of sustainable living and historic authenticity in Sopot Centrum, appealing to investors seeking unique urban assets amidst growing rental demand.
